meta.label: Node pool
meta.description: Predefined configurations for GKE node pools

params.name: machineType
params.label: Machine type
params.description: GCE machine type for the nodes. See GCP documentation for available machine types.

params.name: useGcrIo
params.label: Allow access to gcr.io
params.description: Required to pull images from GCR. Adds 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/devstorage.read_only' in the OAuth scopes

params.name: oauthScopes
params.label: OAuth scopes
params.description: Additional OAuth scopes for the nodes, comma-separated. Not usually required.

params.name: serviceAccount
params.label: Service account
params.description: Run the cluster nodes as this service account. If left empty, the default account of the project is used.

params.name: diskType
params.label: Disk type
params.description: Disk type for the nodes (pd-standard or pd-ssd). Leave empty for default (pd-standard)

params.name: diskSizeGb
params.label: Disk size (GB)
params.description: Disk size for the nodes in gigabytes. Leave 0 for default (currently: 100GB).
